🏠💚 **Stunning Semi-Detached Home for Sale! 🌴**

Are you ready to find your dream home in the heart of Brunei? Look no further! We have an incredible semi-detached house available for sale, perfectly suited for families or investors alike.

Located in a prime kampong, this beautiful property boasts a spacious floor area of 1300 sq. ft., perfect for entertaining and relaxation. With 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, there's ample space for all your loved ones to spread out.

This charming home is priced at BND 160,000 and comes with a plot area of 0.075 acres, offering plenty of room for outdoor activities and entertainment. As a leasehold property, you'll enjoy flexibility and affordability without sacrificing on quality.

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity! Contact us today to schedule a viewing and make your dream home a reality 🎉

🏠💕 **Seize Your Dream Home at Kg. Pangkalan Batu!**

Are you looking for a spacious and comfortable home in the heart of Kg. Pangkalan Batu? Look no further! We have an amazing 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom detached house available for sale.

This beautiful property boasts a total floor area of 2937 square feet, situated on a plot area of approximately 0.085 acres. The current price is BND 250,000, an unbeatable deal for those seeking a peaceful retreat in the midst of urban living.

Features:

- 4 spacious bedrooms
- 4 modern bathrooms
- Total floor area: 2937 sqft
- Plot area: 0.085 ha
- Prime location at Kg. Pangkalan Batu

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity! Contact us today to schedule a viewing and make this house your dream home! 📲💬
